Feb. 14, 1988 D NWABBA Contest (Championship Section)
NWABBA Contest (Championship Section) 0 Test Piece Contest NWABBA Contest nwabba-championship-section
The Force of Destiny (La Forza del Destino) - Overture [arr. F. Wright]
Guild Hall, Preston, Lancashire, England, UK Prizes - 1st £120 and Charles Fradley Trophy, 2nd £80 and Bill Tew Trophy, 3rd £60. 41st annual contest. 11 bands competed.
Oct. 24, 2014, 2:49 p.m. Jan. 24, 2016, 5:11 p.m.
